definition: easy to use/to function well/so that/in order to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: That it should rain on the earth without man in the wilderness, where no mortal dwelleth.
sentences.chinese: 好使雨落在無人之境，降在無人的荒野。

sentences.english: Serve the Lord your God, so that his fierce anger will turn away from you.
sentences.chinese: 又要事奉耶和華你們的神，好使他的烈怒轉離你們。

sentences.english: The doctors decided that a rubber pipe would have to be let in to enable him to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 醫生們決定得插一個橡皮管進去，好使他能呼吸。

sentences.english: Not only that, it’s very easy to use and it works really well.
sentences.chinese: 不但如此，這還非常的易用好使。

sentences.english: But in other place, I use it a few times and works well.
sentences.chinese: 在其他地方，我用了幾次，很好使。

sentences.english: They realigned the desks so that they face the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他們將書桌重新排好使其面向黑板。

sentences.english: You say the elder brother treat rhinitis to use be convenient to use of erythromycin eye ointment?
sentences.chinese: 哥哥你說的治鼻炎用紅黴素眼藥膏好使嗎？

sentences.english: This false one can almost work as real teeth, but just do not bite bones with them.
sentences.chinese: 假牙基本上象真牙一樣好使，只是不能啃骨頭。

sentences.english: How do they ensure that the device is easy to use?
sentences.chinese: 那他們怎麼保證平板電腦夠方便好使呢？

sentences.english: It seemed to work in this case.
sentences.chinese: 這一招似乎在這種情況下好使。

sentences.english: A mouthful went down the wrong way and made him choke.
sentences.chinese: 他一口沒喫好使他噎住了。

sentences.english: He attended the meeting as a goodwill messenger.
sentences.chinese: 他作爲友好使者出席了會議。

sentences.english: American State Secretary Kissinger was the messenger of friendship between China and America.
sentences.chinese: 美國國務卿基辛格是中美關係的友好使者。

definition: erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]
erhua variant of 玩意[wan2 yi4]
erhua variant of 腦瓜|脑瓜[nao3 gua1]
